snippet: Officials are trying to determine if the Tesoro Corporation knew about potential problems with a pipeline that leaked more than 20,000 barrels of crude oil.
abstract: North Dakota officials are trying to determine if the Tesoro Corporation knew about potential problems with a pipeline that leaked more than 20,000 barrels of crude oil in a wheat field in the northwestern part of the state.
lead_paragraph: Officials are trying to determine if the Tesoro Corporation knew about potential problems with a pipeline that leaked more than 20,000 barrels of crude oil.

headline.main: North Dakota: Oil Leak Is Under Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: North Dakota: Oil Leak Is Under Scrutiny
